name: JANVI CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: Janvi Charitable Trust (JCT) is a registered NGO that was established on the 9th of April 1999. The organization works for the betterment of the underprivileged and neglected sectors of our society.  JCT aims to help the marginalized and physically and financially challenged. The organization strives to achieve significant humanitarian results with the funds available. JCT provides Education and Tuition in basic subjects as well as Balwadi classes, Computer classes, Beautician courses, Tailoring- and  Embroidery classes, Fabric- and Glass painting, Candle Making and Mehendi classes.
